title: Yahtzee Game
shortDescription: Yahtzee was developed as a school project in webbutveckling 1 and gr√§nssnittdesign during the last year of gymnasium. The game is developed with react and you can play up to 9 players. The UI is minimalistic and uses CSS without any frameworks.
